dcterms:description: A multimodal fact checking benchmark dataset originally based on textual claims from Snopes and PolitiFact, with associated text and image evidences, divided into train, validation, and test sets.
dcterms:title: MOCHEG

dcterms:description: A fact-checking benchmark featuring news from India and the United States, with both claim and evidence being multimodal, originally labeled in five categories.
dcterms:title: Factify
